title: Some good climate news: the pace of decarbonization in the US is...
content:
Some good climate news: the pace of decarbonization in the US is increasing (due in part to Biden policies); we‚Äôre on track to ‚Äúreduce GHG emissions by 38-56% below 2005 levels in 2035‚Äù, which is 2-4X the pace from 2005 to 2023.
